00090 #define DTRACK_FLYSTICK_MAX_JOYSTICK   8        
00091 
00092 
00098 typedef struct{
00099         int id;         
00100         float quality;  
00101         int num_button; 
00102         int button[DTRACK_FLYSTICK_MAX_BUTTON];  
00103         int num_joystick;  
00104         float joystick[DTRACK_FLYSTICK_MAX_JOYSTICK];  
00105         float loc[3];   
00106         float rot[9];   
00107 } DTrack_FlyStick_Type_f;

00172 #define DTRACK_HAND_MAX_FINGER    5  
00173 
00174 
00179 typedef struct{
00180         int id;         
00181         float quality;  
00182         int lr;         
00183         int nfinger;    
00184         float loc[3];   
00185         float rot[9];   
00186         struct{
00187                 float loc[3];            
00188                 float rot[9];            
00189                 float radiustip;         
00190                 float lengthphalanx[3];  
00191                 float anglephalanx[2];   
00192         } finger[DTRACK_HAND_MAX_FINGER];       
00193 } DTrack_Hand_Type_f;
00194 
00200 typedef struct{
00201         int id;         
00202         double quality; 
00203         int lr;         
00204         int nfinger;    
00205         double loc[3];  
00206         double rot[9];  
00207         struct{
00208                 double loc[3];           
00209                 double rot[9];           
00210                 double radiustip;        
00211                 double lengthphalanx[3]; 
00212                 double anglephalanx[2];  
00213         } finger[DTRACK_HAND_MAX_FINGER];       
00214 } DTrack_Hand_Type_d;
00215 
00219 typedef DTrack_Hand_Type_f DTrack_Hand_Type;

00222 // A.R.T human model type
00223 #define DTRACK_HUMAN_MAX_JOINTS 20
00224 
00231 typedef struct{
00232         int id;         
00233         int num_joints; 
00234         struct {
00235                 int id;          
00236                 float quality;   
00237                 float loc[3];    
00238                 float ang[3];    
00239                 float rot[9];    
00240         } joint[DTRACK_HUMAN_MAX_JOINTS]; 
00241 } DTrack_Human_Type_f;
00242 
00249 typedef struct{
00250         int id;         
00251         int num_joints; 
00252         struct {
00253                 int id;           
00254                 double quality;   
00255                 double loc[3];    
00256                 double ang[3];    
00257                 double rot[9];    
00258         } joint[DTRACK_HUMAN_MAX_JOINTS]; 
00259 } DTrack_Human_Type_d;
00260 
00261 typedef DTrack_Human_Type_d DTrack_Human_Type;
